Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc26
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.model.game

Class CommonTable

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.model.game.CommonTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CommonTable extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a table containing decks every player can interact with
